title.narrative: DRC-Growth with Governance in the Mineral Sector

description.narrative: To strengthen the capacity of key institutions to manage the minerals sector, improve the conditions for increased investments in and revenues from mining, and help increase the socio-economic benefits from artisanal and industrial mining in Project areas.

participating-org.narrative: PIU PROMINES (Ministry of Mines of DRC)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, E.1. (a) | Description :The Recipient shall not later than eighteen (18) months after theEffective Date undertake and adopt a Strategic Environmental and Social Assessment (SESA) under TOR satisfactory to the Associationwhich, among other objectives, will identify in agreement with the Association such new legislation or regulatory instruments asmay be necessary for the environ. and soc. sust. manag. of ind. min.oper | Due Date :31-Dec-2013
